footer.title: Verification Instructions
footer.content:
## How to Verify

1. **Check Debug Output**: Run with `--debug` flag to see skipped parsers
2. **Verify API Endpoints**: Should see 4 endpoints from `users.js`
3. **Verify Models**: Should see Product, ProductVariant, ProductCategory schemas
4. **Verify Types**: Should see ApiResponse, PaginatedResponse, ErrorResponse, enums
5. **Verify Filtering**: `@apiDefine UserNotFound` should NOT appear (skipped by api filter)
6. **Verify Filtering**: `@api {GET} /products/:id` should NOT appear (skipped by models filter)
7. **Verify Filtering**: `@api {GET} /types` should NOT appear (skipped by tsdoc filter)

header.title: Category Testing
header.content:
# Category-Based Parser Testing

This documentation is generated using category-specific parser filtering:

- **api**: Only REST API parsers (`@api`, `@apiParam`, `@apiSuccess`, etc.)
- **models**: Only schema/model parsers (`@apiSchema`, `@apiDefine`, etc.)
- **tsdoc**: Only TypeScript parsers (`@apiSchema`, `@apiEnum`, `@apiTypedef`, etc.)

## Expected Results

### API Category (./api-only)
- ✅ Should parse: `@api`, `@apiParam`, `@apiQuery`, `@apiBody`, `@apiSuccess`, `@apiError`
- ❌ Should skip: `@apiDefine` (included in test but should be filtered out)

### Models Category (./models-only)
- ✅ Should parse: `@apiSchema`, `@apiDefine`, `@apiInterface`
- ❌ Should skip: `@api`, `@apiParam` (included in test but should be filtered out)

### TsDoc Category (./tsdoc-only)
- ✅ Should parse: `@apiSchema`, `@apiEnum`, `@apiTypedef`, `@apiDefine`
- ❌ Should skip: `@api` tags (included in test but should be filtered out)
